CPUUtilization.Name: cpu_utilization
CPUUtilization.Help: The percentage of physical CPU time that Amazon EC2 uses to run the EC2 instance

DiskReadOps.Name: disk_read_ops
DiskReadOps.Help: Completed read operations from all instance store volumes available to the instance

DiskWriteOps.Name: disk_write_ops
DiskWriteOps.Help: Completed write operations to all instance store volumes available to the instance

DiskReadBytes.Name: disk_read_bytes
DiskReadBytes.Help: Bytes read from all instance store volumes available to the instance

DiskWriteBytes.Name: disk_write_bytes
DiskWriteBytes.Help: Bytes written to all instance store volumes available to the instance

MetadataNoToken.Name: metadata_no_token
MetadataNoToken.Help: The number of times IMDS was successfully accessed using a method that does not use a token

MetadataNoTokenRejected.Name: metadata_no_token_rejected
MetadataNoTokenRejected.Help: The number of times an IMDSv1 call was attempted after IMDSv1 was disabled

NetworkIn.Name: network_in_bytes
NetworkIn.Help: The number of bytes received by the instance on all network interfaces

NetworkOut.Name: network_out_bytes
NetworkOut.Help: The number of bytes sent out by the instance on all network interfaces

NetworkPacketsIn.Name: network_packets_in
NetworkPacketsIn.Help: The number of packets received by the instance on all network interfaces

NetworkPacketsOut.Name: network_packets_out
NetworkPacketsOut.Help: The number of packets sent out by the instance on all network interfaces

CPUCreditUsage.Name: cpu_credit_usage
CPUCreditUsage.Help: The number of CPU credits spent by the instance for CPU utilization

CPUCreditBalance.Name: cpu_credit_balance
CPUCreditBalance.Help: The number of earned CPU credits that an instance has accrued since it was launched or started

CPUSurplusCreditBalance.Name: cpu_surplus_credit_balance
CPUSurplusCreditBalance.Help: The number of surplus credits that have been spent by an unlimited instance when its CPUCreditBalance value is zero

CPUSurplusCreditsCharged.Name: cpu_surplus_credits_charged
CPUSurplusCreditsCharged.Help: The number of spent surplus credits that are not paid down by earned CPU credits

DedicatedHostCPUUtilization.Name: dedicated_host_cpu_utilization
DedicatedHostCPUUtilization.Help: The percentage of allocated compute capacity

EBSReadOps.Name: ebs_read_ops
EBSReadOps.Help: Completed read operations from all Amazon EBS volumes attached to the instance

EBSWriteOps.Name: ebs_write_ops
EBSWriteOps.Help: Completed write operations to all EBS volumes attached to the instance

EBSReadBytes.Name: ebs_read_bytes
EBSReadBytes.Help: Bytes read from all EBS volumes attached to the instance

EBSWriteBytes.Name: ebs_write_bytes
EBSWriteBytes.Help: Bytes written to all EBS volumes attached to the instance

EBSIOBalance%.Name: ebs_io_balance_percent
EBSIOBalance%.Help: The percentage of I/O credits remaining in the burst bucket

EBSByteBalance%.Name: ebs_byte_balance_percent
EBSByteBalance%.Help: The percentage of throughput credits remaining in the burst bucket

StatusCheckFailed.Name: status_check_failed
StatusCheckFailed.Help: Reports whether the instance has passed all status checks

StatusCheckFailed_Instance.Name: status_check_failed_instance
StatusCheckFailed_Instance.Help: Reports whether the instance has passed the instance status check

StatusCheckFailed_System.Name: status_check_failed_system
StatusCheckFailed_System.Help: Reports whether the instance has passed the system status check

StatusCheckFailed_AttachedEBS.Name: status_check_failed_attached_ebs
StatusCheckFailed_AttachedEBS.Help: Reports whether the instance has passed the attached EBS status check
